events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still haven’t received it. I want a refund because the delivery seems impossible now.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to a delayed or missing delivery as reported by the customer.
Assigning case to refunds team for processing customer's refund request related to delayed order.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about your order not arriving on time. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the package tracking showed any updates or delivery attempts?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The tracking hasn’t updated for over ten days and it still says ‘in transit.’
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected within 5 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate your help and the prompt refund initiation.
We have completed processing your refund. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if everything else is satisfactory with your account.
Closing this case now as the refund was confirmed received and the customer expressed satisfaction with our support.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience regarding your refund case.
